mods.abstract: Portico colonnade, Temple of Seti I at Qurna, West Thebes (New Kingdom Dynasty XIX); eight lotus capital columns, one broken at base (left) supporting partial lintel incised with cartouche of Rameses II, Egyptian man reclines at base of column (middle); "Temple de Kourak a Thebes/Egypte/170. Bonfils." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
